Title: Cindergut Peppers
Description:
A certain few pandaren around here prefer their dishes unbearably spicy. Unfortunately, my access to such peppers is limited.

The Kunzen hozen, in the mountains to the west, often carry cindergut peppers. A few of those and I'll be set for a few days.

Say, could you collect some for me? You might want to wear gloves if you'll be handling them directly.
